ProjectDetails.project1Description: Building the structures of the future with contemporary design solutions. Modern living spaces where you can experience the beauty of every season.

hero.title: 40 Years of <trust>Trust</trust> and <experience>Experience</experience>
hero.subtitle: The family company building Cyprus's most prestigious residential projects

story.title: Strength from Family Tradition
story.paragraph1: Founded by Ceyhun Tunalı in 1976, our company has become one of the most trusted construction firms in Cyprus with its 40-year history. Starting as a family business, we have always prioritized quality and customer satisfaction.
story.paragraph2: Growing with the second generation, our company produces pioneering projects in the sector with modern architectural understanding and innovative approaches. We continue to raise Cyprus's living standards with our prestigious projects like Four Seasons Life, The Sign, Aurora Bay, and Carob Hill.
story.paragraph3: Today, with our experienced team and strong infrastructure, we work to turn your dream living spaces into reality. In every project, we build structures that will add value for generations by blending our family values with our professional approach.

team.title: Our Professional Team
team.directorBio: Leader defining our company's vision with 40 years of industry experience.
team.assistantDirectorBio: Executive expert in strategic planning and operational excellence.
team.executiveAssistantBio: Professional responsible for management coordination and corporate communication.
team.salesRep1Bio: International customer relations and sales specialist.
team.salesRep2Bio: Customer satisfaction focused experienced sales professional.
team.salesRep3Bio: Project promotion and customer relations expert.
team.accounting2Bio: Budget planning and cost analysis professional.
team.siteChiefBio: Field operations and quality control manager.
team.securityOfficerBio: Work safety and field security coordinator.
team.officeManagerBio: Office management and administrative affairs coordinator.
team.itUnitBio: Information technology and digital infrastructure specialist.

values.innovationDesc: We produce sustainable and modern solutions.
values.deliveryDesc: We fulfill our promises on time.
